attributes.action: Immediately iniciate communication with Iran with intention of freeing the 15 arrested Navy personnel otherwise warn Iran that immediate action will be taken
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Iran should know that Britain will not allow their men to be held captive. Non military methods of communication with Iran should be ignored if they do not release the 15 captive marines/sailors after an initial request and the forces should enter Iran with the intention of releasing the troops

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
